plan.summary: Add 'rename' subcommand to CLI to expose the existing Todo.rename() method

tdd_approach.red_phase: Create failing tests in new test file that verify rename command works via CLI
tdd_approach.green_phase: Add rename subparser to build_parser() and rename handler to run_command() plus TodoApp.rename() method

implementation_sequence: 1. Create new test file tests/test_issue_3545_cli_rename_command.py with 3 failing tests
2. Add rename() method to TodoApp class in cli.py

test_cases.name: test_cli_rename_command_success
test_cases.description: Running 'todo rename 1 new text' successfully renames todo #1

test_cases.name: test_cli_rename_command_nonexistent_id
test_cases.description: Running 'todo rename 99 text' with non-existent ID returns error code 1

test_cases.name: test_cli_rename_command_empty_text
test_cases.description: Running 'todo rename 1 ""' with empty text returns error code 1

changes: Added rename() method to TodoApp class
